title: [PC] Resident Evil 2 2006 Japanese Version Patched to English [F
description:
This is the 2006 Japanese re-release of Resident Evil 2 by SourceNext.
This version came in Japan only, and brought lots of improvements over the original RE2 release on PC.

-Better quality FMV
-Better compatibility with newer hardware/OS
-No more savefile bugs
-No need of graphical configuration to get rid of graphical glitches


This game was japanese-only, but I've applied a patch and exchanged some files from the original EN-US release
and it's now fully in english.

The FMVs have hardcoded japanese subtitles but the audio is in english. I could've put the original EN-US release
FMVs without the hardcoded subs, but this newer FMVs have far better quality and the subs aren't intrusive.

The game is compatible with modern OS/Systems. 
Tested on Win 7 x64 Professional and Ultimate. 
Not sure if the reg files I provided will work on 32bit systems. May need
tweaking if not. I don't have 32bit Windows to test the .reg file I made for 32bit OS.

Tested on i5 2500k@4,8GHz + OCed GTX 770
Tested on i5 2310m + Intel HD3000 (notebook)

The game, like the original, is compatible with joysticks. 
Tested with Wired Xbox 360 Controller for Windows.

To exit the game, press F9 repeatedly.
To toggle between Windowed and Fullscreen, press F8.

Default keyboard control keys are:

Run/cancel - V
status screen - Z
Aim - X
Shoot/Confirm - Space
Map - A
Up, Down, Left and Right Arrows to walk.
Config - F5

**NOTE**
The config menu has a glitch because of original spacing of japanese alphabet.
The FIRST OPTION is "Key Config"
The SECOND OPTION is "Monitor Calibration"
The THIRD OPTION is "Audio Settings" (Stereo, Mono, Volume, etc. Nothing you need to mess with).

====Instructions====
1 Unpack the file with the latest version of 7-Zip, use the password bioresi2 when asked.

2 Use the provided reg key inside the Resident Evil 2 folder, according to your Windows version (32 or 64 bit).

3 Launch the game with bio2.exe inside Resident Evil 2 folder.

4 Play.

====================
I can seed @ 50Mb upload speed from monday to friday, from 8AM to 5PM (Brasilia time GMT-3) and saturdays and sundays only 0.5Mb.

Please seed.
